channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: HOT TAKES: Backlash Erupts After WNBA Issues Statement Threatening to Call Police on 'Racist' Fans
As leader race looms, John Thune takes Senate map by storm to boost GOP candidates
item.description: South Dakota Sen. John Thune is blitzing battleground states for candidates in competitive races as he vies to be the next Senate Republican leader in November.

item.title: Bloomberg Poll: Harris Leads Trump in Swing States
item.description: Democrat presidential candidate Kamala Harris holds a narrow lead over Republican rival Donald Trump in six U.S. swing states and is tied in another, according to a Bloomberg poll of likely voters released Friday.

item.title: MSDNC's Stephanie Ruhle Does Herself and Kamala Harris No Favors With Hostile Defenses for 'Interview'
Vulnerable Dem senator ripped for votes on key 2024 Rust Belt issue: 'Lockstep' with Harris
item.description: Ohio Dem. Sen. Sherrod Brown is facing increased criticism on his fracking stance as the issue becomes more prevalent in the 2024 election.

item.title: Rep. Walberg to Newsmax: Michiganders See Differences in Trump, Harris
item.description: Rep. Tim Walberg, R-Mich., told Newsmax on Friday that he's "really encouraged" by how Michigan voters perceive former President Donald Trump.

item.title: The Reason Behind Everyone's Problem With the Girlboss Trope
North Carolina removes 747,000 from voter rolls
item.description: The North Carolina Board of Elections dropped over 747,000 individuals from state voter rolls via an audit that began at the beginning of 2023, the board announced this week.

item.title: Emerson Poll: Trump Trails Harris by 14 Points in N.Y.
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris is holding a 14-point lead over former President Donald Trump in New York, according to new Emerson College polling results, doubling the points President Joe Biden held in the lead in May. The poll for The Hill/WPIX was conducted Sep. 23-25...

item.title: WATCH: Dana Perino Decimates Kamala Harris Over Her Vacuousness
Multiple people with ties to Iran indicted in relation to Trump campaign hacking plot: sources
item.description: Multiple people with connections to Iran have been indicted in relation to a hacking plot against former President Donald Trump's campaign Specific charges have also not yet been released.

item.title: North Carolina Removes 747K People From Voter Rolls
item.description: The battleground state of North Carolina removed more than 747,000 people from the state's list of registered voters over the past 20 months, officials said in a press release on Thursday.

item.title: Upcoming SCOTUS Conference Could Strengthen Public Worker Protections
White House declines to say if Iran killing Trump would be an 'act of war'
item.description: President Biden is resisting Republican demands to warn Iran in no uncertain terms that killing President Trump would be an act of war.

item.title: David Friedman to Newsmax: Biden Weak on Iran; Hezbollah Attacks Israel
item.description: Despite trying to get Hezbollah to stop firing rockets on Israel for almost a year, the Biden administration has been unsuccessful because it refuses to confront Iran, former Ambassador to Israel David Friedman told Newsmax Thursday.
